name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise-canceling technology and up to 30 hours of battery life. Perfect for both travel and office use, providing clear and immersive sound in all environments.

name: Smartwatch Pro
description: Advanced smartwatch with health tracking, GPS, and customizable watch faces. Compatible with both iOS and Android devices. Stay connected and monitor your health all day long.

name: 4K Ultra HD TV
description: Experience stunning picture quality with this 55-inch 4K Ultra HD television. Features include smart functionality, HDR support, and integrated streaming apps. Perfect for home entertainment enthusiasts.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: Powerful gaming laptop with a high-refresh-rate display, dedicated graphics, and an ultra-fast processor. Optimized for performance in both gaming and professional applications.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with superior sound quality and a durable, waterproof design. Ideal for outdoor adventures, parties, or casual use at home. Battery lasts up to 20 hours.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Stay on top of your fitness goals with this sleek and lightweight fitness tracker. It monitors your heart rate, sleep patterns, and activity levels while syncing seamlessly with your smartphone.

name: Noise Cancelling Earbuds
description: Compact and wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and crystal-clear sound. Features a comfortable fit and long battery life, making it perfect for commuters and travelers.

name: Smart Home Hub
description: Control your smart home devices with this all-in-one hub. Compatible with most smart devices, it allows voice control, automation, and energy management right from your smartphone.

name: Wireless Charger
description: Sleek and fast wireless charger compatible with most smartphones and wireless earbuds. Its compact design makes it perfect for any desk or bedside table. Charges through most phone cases.

name: Electric Scooter
description: Eco-friendly electric scooter with a range of 25 miles on a single charge. Perfect for urban commuting or weekend rides, offering both speed and safety in a stylish design.
